reviewText: The seller for these DVDS was awesome! My items were returned by the post office attendant and he was really willing to work with me to have it reshipped! Very responsive!

I totally love the Donut man! It is very good for kids, with great spiritual lessons that are realistic and understandable. I would advise every family with young children to get some of these videos! Jesus Christ is King and His return is drawing near!

2 "stories" on 1 DVD.  Each run around 30 minutes each.  Highly recommended for Christian families trying to find some Biblical and fun teaching and songs for children 10 years of age and under.  Safe and encouraging.
